attributes.action: heavily tax people who own more than 3 properties. Greedy people are creating a false property boom that is preventing young people from finding a simple home to live in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The property market is in a serious crisis. Overblown valuations are being shored up by a false demand created by financial interests (banks) and wealthy overseas investors. People who should stop this (politicians and journalists) are among the worst offenders and have a lot to gain by doing nothing. Wealthy people don't need more than 2 or 3 houses surely? Taxing is fairest instrument.
